About.title: Full-Stack Developer
About.paragraph: My name is Kenan. I recently graduated from Lambda School's Full-Stack Web Development & Computer Science program. I enjoy creating user-friendly interfaces and web applications. I am constantly experimenting with new technologies and always striving to improve as a developer and designer. I’m currently focusing on maintaining my skills with JavaScript, React, Node, along with learning TypeScript and Next.js. When I'm not coding, I enjoy working out, hiking, gaming, and spending time with family or friends.

Project1.title: DEV.FIT
Project1.desc: A React web application that allows users to register/login and keep track of their workout log, intermittent fasting, personal goals, and streaks for consistency.

Project2.title: Human Rights First: Blue Witness
Project2.desc: A React web application for journalists to view use-of-force reports by police across the United States of America.
Project2.stack: React.js | Redux | React Map GL | Ant Design | Axios | Okta Auth

Project3.title: Airbnb Clone
Project3.desc: A NextJS web application Airbnb clone that allows users to book a place to stay and view specific stay details.
Project3.stack: JavaScript | React | NextJS | TailwindCSS | Mapbox | Vercel

Project4.title: Gilded Rose Refactoring Kata
Project4.desc: A code kata that involves:  writing unit tests for suitable test cases, refactoring of legacy code into higher quality code, implementing a new feature into the existing code.

Contact.paragraph: Feel free to contact me for career prospects, business services, and any other professional inquires.
